head.supplied: 22/1/94 ¶ ¶ When coming to this weeks mail-work, dear Mr Macdonald, I find that I have as yet not returned to you Major Darwin's letter. ¶ Will you kindly reply as Hon. Secr. of our branch officiall...

div.p: A38, The Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Vic. Branch), Mitchell Library, State Library of NSW, Sydney.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
When coming to this weeks mail-work, dear Mr Macdonald, I find that I have as yet not returned to you Major Darwin's letter.
Letter not found. Is there a file copy at RGS in London?
Will you kindly reply as Hon. Secr. of our branch officially, acknowledging the honor done us, assuring the home Soc. of our desire of aiding the Congress,
International Geographical Congress, London, 1895. but pointing out, that [at my]
editorial addition.
advanced age and with my local professional responsibilities I should find it impossible to attend personally at this great international gathering of geographers.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: We must make at the next Council-Meeting special arrangements, how to aid this congress by timely efforts.
